trans-unit.source: Crops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: CroppedBitmap implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: CroppedBitmap 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can occur only during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>发出信号初始化已开始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>以指示已完成初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: CroppedBitmap objects created by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and properties cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建 CroppedBitmap 对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29>自动初始化构造函数，因此，不能更改属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29>

trans-unit.source: Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用转换之后，将图像保存到文件，则必须更新与映像数据相关的元数据标记。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A> property of this class to define the area of the bitmap that is to be cropped.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A>的此类，以定义要裁剪的位图的区域的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>使用此构造函数创建的你必须执行之间的属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>调用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref> class that has the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>具有指定的类<> *1> 和<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>使用此构造函数创建的对象将自动初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>实例。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*>

trans-unit.target: 必须 BeginInit 之间执行属性初始化和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>调用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>已初始化，属性更改将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位图的源。

trans-unit.source: You can chain a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> to another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by setting the Source property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> to the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以链接<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>到另一个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>到相应的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>的源属性</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: For more information about chaining, see [How to: Chain BitmapSource Objects Together](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关链接的详细信息，请参阅[How to︰ 链 BitmapSource 对象在一起](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 位图源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rectangular area that the bitmap is cropped to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位图裁剪为的矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> with a SourceRect set to <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will render the entire image.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>与设置为 SourceRect<xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>将呈现整个图像。</xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that is not fully within the bounds of the bitmap will not render.
trans-unit.target: 完全不在的位图的边界内的矩形将不会呈现。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area that the bitmap is cropped to.
trans-unit.target: 位图裁剪为的矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。
